Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso come into the match after a 1-1 draw against Senegal, with Ousseni Bouda scoring a last-minute equalizer.
Malawi will be looking to bounce back from a 3-2 home defeat against Burundi.
Burkina Faso has a strong defensive and midfield spine, with key players like Edmond Tapsoba and Issa Kabore expected to start.
Malawi's return of Gomezgani Chirwa at left-back is a welcome addition, and they have a fully-fit squad.
The match is part of the Africa Cup of Nations qualifying group stage, with Burkina Faso aiming to secure a crucial win.
